title: Chickpea pasta salad
ingredients: ['1 1/2 (400g) tins, drained', '4 tomatoes, chopped', '1 onion, chopped', '1 clove garlic, minced', '150g feta cheese, crumbled', '140g pitted black olives', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper', '120ml olive oil', '60ml fresh lemon juice', '100g macaroni']
